author: Staff Reporter
text:
A special team led by Rural Administration Deputy Superintendent of Police K. Sudharsan started an investigation into the death of actor Kalabhavan Mani.

As there were rumours about finding poison in his body, the police ordered special investigation into his death.

A team of doctors conducted two-hour post-mortem examination of the body at Thrissur Medical College Hospital on Monday.

The doctors said his internal organs had been sent for tests.

A conclusion can be reached only after getting the result, they added.

Though police have registered an FIR for unnatural death, they refused to divulge anything further.

The police questioned the workers at the actor’s outhouse at Chalakudy, where he had allegedly consumed alcohol with his friends.
title: Special team starts probe
